sqlMap.select: SELECT MENU_ID ID, OWN_MENU_ID PID, MENU_NAME TEXT, MENU_DESC, LINK_URL URL, MENU_ICON ICON FROM T01_SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_ID <> '1' AND STATUS = 1 AND MENU_ID IN ($menuIds$) order by OWN_MENU_ID ,MENU_SEQ
SELECT user_id userId, user_name userName, user_desc userDesc, logon_name logonName FROM T01_SYS_user where logon_name = #logonName# and password = #password#
